languages.text: "Мое сердце ликует, ведь я помогла тебе обрести покой. Пусть и на время".
"My heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."
languages.original_text: "Мое сердце ликует, ведь я помогла тебе обрести покой. Пусть и на время".

traits.locale_text: "My heart sings: I've helped you find peace. Even if it's just for a short while."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My heart sings: I've helped you find peace. Even if it's just for a short while."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “能帮助你找到平静，哪怕只是短暂的平静，也足以令我心情雀跃。”
languages.original_text: "My heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: “能帮助你找到平静，哪怕只是短暂的平静，也足以令我心情雀跃。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Mi corazón canta de júbilo, pues te he ayudado a encontrar la paz. Aunque solo sea por un instante».
languages.original_text: "My heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: «Mi corazón canta de júbilo, pues te he ayudado a encontrar la paz. Aunque solo sea por un instante».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mon cœur chante, car je vous ai {mf|aidé|aidée} à trouver la paix, ne serait-ce qu'un court instant. »
languages.original_text: "My heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: « Mon cœur chante, car je vous ai {mf|aidé|aidée} à trouver la paix, ne serait-ce qu'un court instant. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Herz singt, weil ich Euch geholfen habe, Frieden zu finden. Wenn auch nur für kurze Zeit."
languages.original_text: "My heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Herz singt, weil ich Euch geholfen habe, Frieden zu finden. Wenn auch nur für kurze Zeit."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我の心は歌っている。お前が平穏を見つける手助けができたのだから。たとえそれがほんの束の間だったとしても」
languages.original_text: "My heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: 「我の心は歌っている。お前が平穏を見つける手助けができたのだから。たとえそれがほんの束の間だったとしても」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Kısa bir süreliğine de olsa huzura erişmene yardım edebildiğim için içim rahat."
languages.original_text: "My heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: "Kısa bir süreliğine de olsa huzura erişmene yardım edebildiğim için içim rahat."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
